LanguageData.RTCP_DisplayFormatChoice_descr: Choose how the real-time clock in the UI should be displayed. Settings are effective immediately.
LanguageData.UPTT_DisplayLocation_desc: Choose where the Session Play Time Tracker should appear in. Settings are effective immediately.\n\nNote: The tracker will not appear if you choose "Real time clock" but did not activate "Show real time clock" in the settings.
LanguageData.UPTT_Format_desc: Choose where the Session Play Time Tracker should appear in. Settings are effective immediately.\n\nNote: The tracker will not appear if you choose "Real time clock" but did not activate "Show real time clock" in the settings.
LanguageData.UPTT_CountDownFrom_desc: Choose how long the count down timer should be in minutes.
LanguageData.SPTT_UseColorGradient_desc: Indicate whether you wish to see a colored background for the SPTT Alert. Settings are effective immediately.\n\nNote: the colored background changes color with respect to time to indicate time passage. Not applicable when SPTT timer is displayed in the "Real time clock" location.
LanguageData.SPTT_UseHoursPart_desc: Indicate whether the SPTT Alert should show its hours part. Settings are effective immediately.
LanguageData.SPTT_UseMillisecondPart_desc: Indicate whether the SPTT Alert should show its millisecond part. Settings are effective immediately.
LanguageData.SPTT_BeMinimalist_desc: Timer. Time. Is OK. No more. Now.
